meanings.definition: A fastening device consisting of two parallel rows of metal or plastic teeth that are interlocked by a sliding tab.
meanings.sent1: I pulled the zippers on my jacket to keep warm.
meanings.sent2: She fixed the broken zippers on her backpack.
meanings.sent3: The zippers on the sleeping bag decided to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: The zippers of friendship connect us together.
meanings.sent5: The shiny zippers gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To close or fasten with a zipper.
meanings.sent1: He zippers his coat before going outside.
meanings.sent2: Please zipper the bag to keep the items safe.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to zipper the nut in its tiny paws.
meanings.sent4: She zippers her heart to protect her feelings.
meanings.sent5: The magician zippers the secret inside his hat.
